title: Facebook : monthly brand profile follower growth 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The maximum Growth rate 3.28 is found at Month Sep '17 and the minimum is found at Nov '17 where Month is 0.1.
The Growth rate of Month Nov '17 is 32.8% smaller than the maximum value at Sep '17.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate and Nov '17 has the lowest Growth rate.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The maximum Growth rate 3.28 is found at Month Sep '17 and the minimum is found at Nov '17 where Month is 0.1.
The Growth rate of Month Nov '17 is 32.8% smaller than the maximum value at Sep '17.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Growth rate in each Month on the y axis.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
The highest Month Sep '17 has 3.18 more Growth rate than the lowest Month Nov '17.
The Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate, followed by Aug '17, and Dec '17. Down to the Month Nov '17 which is the lowest.
Over the past 5 Months, the Growth rate has increased.
Month Nov '17, and Oct '17 share the same value 0.1.
The Month Nov '17 has 3.34 times less Growth rate than average.
The Growth rate is 4.91 if we add up values of all Months.
